1: On that day you will say: “I will give thanks to you, LORD, although you were angry with me. Your anger has turned away, and you have comforted me.
2: Indeed, God is my salvation; I will trust him and not be afraid, for the LORD, the LORD himself, is my strength and my song. He has become my salvation.”
3: You will joyfully draw water from the springs of salvation,
4: and on that day you will say: “Give thanks to the LORD; proclaim his name! Make his works known among the peoples. Declare that his name is exalted.
5: Sing to the LORD, for he has done glorious things. Let this be known throughout the earth.
6: Cry out and sing, citizen of Zion, for the Holy One of Israel is among you in his greatness.”
